author: Anjum Anand
method: Heat the oil and butter in a small non-stick frying pan. Add the onion and fry for about four minutes, until soft. Beat together the rest of the ingredients in a bowl and pour into the pan and scramble as normal. Take them off the heat when they are cooked to your taste.  Serve with toast or naan bread.
ingredients: 1 tsp vegetable oil ,  a knob of butter,  2 tbsp finely chopped onion,  ½ small tomato, chopped,  ¼ green chilli, seeded and sliced (optional), or pinch of red chilli powder,  2 eggs, beaten ,  salt to taste,  1 tbsp chopped fresh coriander
